titleStmt.title: [An apology for the treatise, called A triall of faith. Concerning the precedency of repentance for sinne, before faith in Christ for pardon]
titleStmt.author: Chibald, William, 1575-1641.

notesStmt.note: A defence of: Chibald, William. A tryall of faith.
Imperfect; title page illegible; as filmed lacks errata at end.
